title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view at first
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in the library outline view.
OB: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node instead of allowing selection of the desired item.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label to the library file.
2. Select the label item in the library outline view.
3. [Add any additional steps here]
